description:
Light, breathable, comfortable – the Kyanite Lightweight Hoody provides measured warmth for hikes, ski tours, and hanging out at camp. The Torrent™ fleece manages moisture and stretches for unrestricted freedom. An anti-odour finish keeps it fresh on long trips. The fit is streamlined, and the minimalist design is clean and focused.

Updated with a new fabric made with recycled content.
name: Arcteryx Kyanite Lightweight Hoody - Mens
